Name: I Got Your Back
Title: Noelle: I Got Your Back
Desc: A stout heart is the sternest armor.
Source: Reward for inviting Noelle to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: I Got Your Back
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1602]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1602] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16022]</color> once.
After <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1602] uses a Normal Attack:</color> If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116021]</color> are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1602] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C116021.Name: Full Plate
C116021.Desc: Grant <color=#FFFFFFFF>2 $[K6] points</color> to your active character.\nBefore this $[K6] is fully consumed, the $[K100] you take is halved. (The figure will be rounded up)

K6.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>
K6.Desc: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
